contest-event.event-date: Oct. 16, 1954 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Sovereign Heritage Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK J. Beaver and F. Wright were the joint referees. Prizes: 1st: 200 Guineas 2nd: 150 Guineas 3rd: 75 Guineas 4th: 50 Guineas Oct. 14, 2011, 2:20 p.m. Oct. 14, 2011, 2:27 p.m. 1 Fairey Band Harry Mortimer 2 City of Manchester Alex Mortimer 3 Fodens Band Harry Mortimer 4 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Eric Ball 5 Creswell Colliery Band George Hespe 6 Ferodo Works Band George Hespe Unknown Result Morris Motors Band Harry Mortimer Unknown Result Hoo Silver Eric Ball Unknown Result Camborne Town Band Fred Roberts Unknown Result YEWCO George Hespe Unknown Result Cooperation Band Enoch Jackson Unknown Result Parc and Dare Band William Scholes Unknown Result Crookhall Colliery J.
